main event: A bright light was sighted near New London, Connecticut, on July 24, 1953, by an Air Force pilot.
interesting points: The object was described as bright and hovered for about 1 minute before accelerating out of sight., It was estimated to be 1.5-20 miles away and at an altitude of 2000-3000 feet., No material evidence was obtained from the sighting., The object was witnessed by only one confirmed witness, a Captain in the Air Force., Previous sightings near the same area by airline pilots raised questions about a potential pattern of sightings.
sighted object: a bright light in the sky
witness description: Captain in the Air Force, pilot
